publication.abstract:
In this paper we attempt to segment the lateral ventricles using the ITK provided Confidence 
Connected algorithm. An ITK application was used to explore the various input parameters 
to produce an image of acceptable presentation. Input MRI data of healthy individual 
was provided through the MIDAS repository resulting in a segmented image.

reviews.content:
When using open-source data, please include any citations requested by the person who donated the data, as well as the link to where the data can be found.


The details on the data used are published on MIDAS:

http://insight-journal.org/midas/view_community.php?communityid=21

The data was donated by Dr. Bullitt at UNC and she has provided a reference.

publication.title: Confidence Connected Segmentation of the Lateral Ventricles
